channel.title: Court Wizard Suggestion
channel.description:
This comes from a noob that still is afraid to play, but loves to watch streams, don't be too harsh :sweat_smile:
- Court Wizard. Not Unique.
**Day Abilities:** + Simulacrum [2 Uses] Target someone. Next night, all the abilities targeting you will target your target instead, and vice versa.
**Night Abilities:** + Perception [Infinite Uses] Target someone. You will know if he/she uses a Day ability during the next day.
+ Invisibility [2 uses] Your target is not visible at the table, and cannot be targeted by day abilities or voted up for execution next day.
**Reasoning**:
- Switching tornado to day ability and limiting it by including yourself in the switch should mantain the flavour of the class but leave some more space for the Night abilities.
- Perception could be useful to make bleeding and poison plays a bit more risky, but it's still targeted, but at the same time it doesn't show which day ability has been used, so it may promote a bit of extra lying space. Can also be a mean of confirmation but requires setup.
- Invisibility ... well, I just thought that CW could make use of something interesting and new, a mechanic that isn't already somewhere else. Making someone invisible avoids day execution for a specific player, which is something that isn't present in the game right now. Also could be useful to ward from bleeds or poison.
